description:
Barry, the self-absorbed actor, tries to undermine Gohan’s reputation! But when the parasite chooses Barry as its host, it’s not just Gohan who’s in trouble. With the main actor under alien control, can Gohan save both the city and the movie?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai Suru Mono no Tame ni! Fukutsu no Great Saiyaman!!
For the Ones He Loves! The Unbeatable Great Saiyaman!!
Für Jene, die er liebt! - Der große Saiyaman lässt sich nicht unterkriegen!
Pelos que Ele Ama! O Imbatível Grande Saiyaman!!
愛するもののために! 不屈のグレートサイヤマン!!
